Tradingview regions traded securities

Acquires ticker symbols for specified regions

get_data_tradingview_regions_tickers(regions = c("america", "uk", "australia",
  "brazil", "canada", "euronext", "germany", "hongkong", "india", "japan",
  "mexico", "newzealand", "russia", "singapore", "spain", "switzerland",
  "taiwan", "turkey"), return_message = TRUE, nest_data = FALSE)

Arguments

regions

vector of regions

  • america

  • uk

  • australia

  • brazil

  • canada

  • euronext

  • germany

  • hongkong

  • india

  • japan

  • mexico

  • newzealand

  • russia

  • singapore

  • spain

  • switzerland

  • taiwan

  • turkey
return_message

if TRUE return message

  • Arguments
